Description: The following statement contains a magic number: AssemblyMetadataValue = (from ca in assembly.GetCustomAttributesData()                                           where ca.Constructor.DeclaringType == type && ca.ConstructorArguments.Count == 2                                           let key = ca.ConstructorArguments[0].Value as string                                           let value = ca.ConstructorArguments[1].Value as string                                           where                                               key != null &&                                               value != null &&                                               string.Equals(key' AssemblyMetadataKey' StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase)                                           select value).FirstOrDefault();
